history.proof: apply Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra. intros n. srun best use: @option_ord_res_None, @option_ord_incr_None unfold: Krelation.

original: apply Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra. intros n. pose proof incr_exists n as [m [Hm1 Hm2]]. exists (Some m). split. - intros e He. refine (residue_extensible _ _ _). + auto. + apply incr_unital_iff_residual. apply Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra. intros n. apply (ex_intro _ m (conj Hm1 Hm2)). - apply Some. apply Hm2.
